description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Arc' that renders an animated elliptical arc in an SVG element, using React hooks for state management. It includes utility functions for geometric calculations and makes use of external libraries like 'react' and 'remotion'.

methods.name: getCircumferenceOfArc
methods.description: Calculates the circumference of an elliptical arc based on radii rx and ry.
